metadata.disclaimer: Based on publicly available crosswalks and expert analysis. Validate with qualified assessors for compliance/audit use.

clauses.title: Security Management
clauses.rationale: PM-1 security program; PM-2 roles; PM-3 resources; PM-9 risk strategy; PM-6 measures.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz requires an information security management system following BSI standards. SP 800-53 provides security program controls but BSI-specific ISMS methodology not addressed.

clauses.title: Organization
clauses.rationale: PM-1/PM-2 program and roles; PL-1 security planning; AC-5 separation of duties.
clauses.gaps: BSI Grundschutz covers organizational aspects including security organization, responsibilities, and processes. SP 800-53 addresses these but BSI-specific organizational requirements need supplementation.

clauses.title: Personnel
clauses.rationale: PS family personnel security; AT family training; PM-13 workforce.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz personnel module aligns well with SP 800-53 PS and AT families.

clauses.title: Awareness and Training
clauses.rationale: AT family comprehensive for awareness and training. PM-13 workforce; PM-14 testing.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Identity and Access Management
clauses.rationale: AC and IA families comprehensive for identity and access management.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Compliance Management
clauses.rationale: CA-2 assessments; PM-1 program; PL-4 rules of behavior; SA-4 contractual.
clauses.gaps: BSI Grundschutz compliance module covers legal, regulatory, and contractual compliance management. SP 800-53 lacks a dedicated compliance management control.

clauses.title: Crypto Concept
clauses.rationale: SC-12 key management; SC-13 cryptographic protection; SC-28 encryption at rest; SC-8 encryption in transit.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz requires a formal cryptographic concept document. SP 800-53 covers cryptography controls but the formal concept document is BSI-specific.

clauses.title: Privacy
clauses.rationale: PT family privacy; PM-25 minimization; PM-26 complaints; PM-27 reporting.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz privacy module aligned with GDPR. SP 800-53 PT family covers privacy but EU/German-specific GDPR implementation less explicit.

clauses.title: Data Backup
clauses.rationale: CP-9 system backup; CP-6 alternate storage; CP-9(1) testing restoration.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Deletion and Destruction
clauses.rationale: MP-6 media sanitization; SI-12 information management.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz covers comprehensive deletion and destruction. MP-6 covers media sanitization comprehensively.

clauses.title: Information Security on Business Trips
clauses.rationale: AC-17 remote access; AC-19 mobile devices; PE-17 alternate work site; SC-28 protection at rest.
clauses.gaps: BSI Grundschutz has a specific module for travel security. SP 800-53 covers through remote access and mobile device controls but travel-specific security (hotel, transit) less explicit.

clauses.title: Proper IT Administration
clauses.rationale: AC-2 account management; AC-5 separation of duties; AC-6 least privilege; CM-3 change control; CM-5 access restrictions for change.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz IT administration module aligns well with SP 800-53 access and configuration controls.

clauses.title: Patch and Change Management
clauses.rationale: CM-3 change control; CM-4 impact analysis; SI-2 flaw remediation with automated patching.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Protection Against Malware
clauses.rationale: SI-3 malware protection with enhancements; SI-8 spam protection.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Logging
clauses.rationale: AU family comprehensive for logging.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Software Testing
clauses.rationale: SA-11 developer testing with static/dynamic analysis; CM-4 impact analysis.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz software testing module aligns well with SA-11.

clauses.title: Telecommuting
clauses.rationale: AC-17 remote access; PE-17 alternate work site; SC-28 protection at rest.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz telecommuting module includes home office security requirements.

clauses.title: Remote Maintenance
clauses.rationale: MA-4 nonlocal maintenance with auditing and strong authentication enhancements.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Detection of Security-Relevant Events
clauses.rationale: SI-4 system monitoring; AU-6 audit review; CA-7 continuous monitoring; IR-5 incident monitoring.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Incident Management
clauses.rationale: IR family comprehensive for incident management.
clauses.gaps: Minimal gap.

clauses.title: Business Continuity Management
clauses.rationale: CP family comprehensive for contingency/continuity.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz BCM module extends beyond IT. SP 800-53 focuses on IT contingency.

clauses.title: Building
clauses.rationale: PE family comprehensive for physical and environmental protection.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz has detailed building-level physical security. PE family covers most aspects.

clauses.title: Data Centre
clauses.rationale: PE family covers data centre physical/environmental protection.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz has specific data centre requirements (cooling, power, fire suppression).

clauses.title: Network Architecture and Design
clauses.rationale: SC-7 boundary protection; PL-8 security architecture; SC-32 partitioning; AC-4 information flow.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz network architecture module aligns well with SP 800-53 network controls.

clauses.title: Network Management
clauses.rationale: CM-6 configuration; CM-7 least functionality; CM-2 baselines; SC-7 boundary.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz network management includes SNMP hardening and network device management specifics.

clauses.title: Router and Switches
clauses.rationale: CM-6 configuration settings; CM-7 least functionality; SC-7 boundary protection; CM-2 baselines.
clauses.gaps: BSI Grundschutz has device-specific modules. SP 800-53 covers through general configuration and network controls.

clauses.title: General Server
clauses.rationale: CM-2 baselines; CM-6 settings; CM-7 least functionality; SI-2 patching; AC-3 access.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz has server-specific hardening requirements.

clauses.title: General Client
clauses.rationale: CM family configuration; SI-2 patching; AC-3 access; SC-28 encryption at rest.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz has client-specific hardening requirements.

clauses.title: Office Products
clauses.rationale: CM-6 configuration; CM-7 least functionality; SI-3 malware; SC-18 mobile code.
clauses.gaps: BSI Grundschutz has specific office product security modules. SP 800-53 covers through general application controls.

clauses.title: Web Applications and Web Services
clauses.rationale: SA-11 developer testing; SC-7 boundary; SI-10 input validation; SC-8 transmission protection.
clauses.gaps: Minor: BSI Grundschutz has specific web application security requirements. SP 800-53 covers through development and infrastructure controls.
